                  COUNCIL





                               COUNCIL DECISION

                                                 of 18 December 1997

          on the provisional application of a Memorandum of Understanding between the European
                  Community and the Arab Republic of Egypt on trade in textile products

                                                 (98/135/EC)


THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,                on  trade  in  textile  products  shall  be  applied on  a
                                                                provisional basis from 1 January 1998 pending its formal
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European      conclusion, subject to reciprocal provisional application

with Article 228(2), first sentence, thereof,

EN
Official Journal of the European Communities
L 41/1
13.2.98

on the provisional application of a Memorandum of Understanding between the European
Community and the Arab Republic of Egypt on trade in textile products
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,

on trade in textile products shall be applied on a
provisional basis from 1 January 1998 pending its formal
conclusion, subject to reciprocal provisional application
by the Arab Republic of Egypt.

Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European
Community, and in particular Article 113 in conjunction
with Article 228(2), first sentence, thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the Commission,

The text of the Memorandum of Understanding is
attached to this Decision.

Whereas the Commission has negotiated on behalf of the
European Community a Memorandum of Understanding
on trade in textile products with the Arab Republic of
Egypt;

This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of
the European Communities.

Whereas this Memorandum of Understanding should be
applied on a provisional basis from 1 January 1998
pending the completion of the procedures required for its
conclusion, subject to reciprocal provisional application
by the Arab Republic of Egypt,

The Memorandum of Understanding between the
European Community and the Arab Republic of Egypt
